title: Estimated relative potential for airborne SARS-CoV-2 transmission in a day care centre

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Ilpo Kulmala, Aimo Taipale, Enni Sanmark, Natalia Lastovets, Piia Sormunen, Pekka Nuorti, Sampo Saari, Anni Luoto, Arto Säämänen
